message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. It's not just an item; it's an investment in excellence and efficiency. Given its value to you, I believe it's worth every penny of the $12000. However, I understand that such a significant purchase might require careful consideration. Therefore, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $11000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents a savings of $1000 compared to the standard retail price. I trust that this exceptional deal will make the decision-making process easier for you. Should you have any questions or need further information, please don't hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response.
